html:
Header

Documentation:
Android 6 is the most stable android platform version.
-to add this platform run ionic cordova platform add android@6 in your terminal

Possible Bugs:
*MERGE DEX ERROR WHEN BULDING OR RUNNING APP
-type cordova plugin add --save https://github.com/jwall149/cordova-multidex in your terminal
-change facebopook version to 4.25.0 if you added facebook plugin
-run cordova clean in your terminal

*InvalidClassPAth when building app
-replace this on your project.gradle
allprojects { repositories { maven { url "https://maven.google.com" } jcenter
